panels.description: Whether the node is running against mainnet or not.
panels.title: Main network

panels.description: Whether the node is fully in sync with the network or not.
panels.title: Synchronized

panels.description: Current chain's block height vs node's current height. When syncing, let's one quickly tell how far the node is from being synchronized with the network.
panels.title: Height and Target

panels.description: Maximum hard limit for block size scaling, as well as median used for scaling factor
panels.title: Block size median and limit

panels.description: For how long this node has been up.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Number of blocks alternative to the longest chain
panels.title: Alternative blocks

panels.description: Amount of free space in the partition where the Monero database is located at.
panels.title: Free space

panels.description: Size of Monero's database on disk.
panels.title: Database Size

panels.description: The distribution of how long ago peers in the whitelist have been seen.
panels.title: White Peerlist last seen distribution

panels.description: Number of peers in each peer list.
panels.title: Peerlists' count

panels.description: Rate of data transmission in and out from this node (p2p and rpc).
panels.title: Data rate

panels.description: Number of connections based on their direction (incoming/outgoing)
panels.title: Connections by direction (in/out)

panels.description: Number of connections based on their connection state.
panels.title: Connections by connection state

panels.description: Total amount of data sent and received by this node.
panels.title: Data

panels.description: The distribution of data retrieval from our connected peers.
panels.title: P2P Peers Data Receive Rate

panels.description: The distribution of data transmission to our connected peers.
panels.title: P2P Peers Data Transmission Rate

panels.description: The distribution of the heights of our peers
panels.title: Connected Peers' Height

panels.description: The distribution of the age of the connections established to/from our nodes.
panels.title: Connections' Age

panels.description:
Average number of RPC requests served over the past minute.

ps.: this includes the calls made by the stats collector too.
panels.title: RPC hits per minute

panels.description:
Average amount of time spent serving RPC methods over that past minute.

ps.: this includes the calls made by the stats collector too.
panels.title: Time spent serving RPC methods

panels.description: Number of RPC connections being served.
panels.title: RPC Connections

panels.description: Total number of key images spent across all transactions that are still in the pool
panels.title: Spent Key Images

panels.description: Total size of the block
panels.title: Size

panels.description: Number of transactions in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: The distribution of the sizes of the transactions in the pool.
panels.title: Transaction Size

panels.description: The distribution fees (in micronero) per kB for the transactions still in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Transaction Fees Distribution (per kB)

panels.description: Total amount of fees (in Monero) for the transactions in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Fees

panels.description: The distribution of the amount of inputs used in transactions still in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Transaction Inputs

panels.description: The distribution of the amount of outputs used in transactions still in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Transaction Outputs

panels.description: Total number of inputs and outputs from the transactions still in the pool.
panels.title: Inputs and Outputs

panels.description: A couple of statistics that reveals weird scenarios found in the transaction pool.
panels.title: Weird cases

panels.description: Distribution of for how long transactions have been sitting in the pool.
panels.title: Transaction Age

panels.description: Height of the last block in the chain.
panels.title: Height

panels.description: Total amount of fees (in Monero) included in the last block.
panels.title: Fees

panels.description: Newly amount of Monero created in this block as a miner subsidy.
panels.title: Subsidy

panels.description: The distribution fees (in micronero) per kB for the transactions included in the block seen as last at the time.
panels.title: Transaction Fees Distribution (per kB)

panels.description: Total block rewards granted to the miner of this block (transaction fees + block subsidy).
panels.title: Rewards

panels.description: Total size of the block
panels.title: Size

panels.description: Number of transactions included in the block
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: Number of transactions included in the block
panels.title: Inputs and Outputs

panels.description: The distribution of sizes of the transactions included in this block.
panels.title: Transaction Size Distribution

panels.description: The distribution of the amount of inputs used in transactions included in this block.
panels.title: Transaction Inputs

panels.description: The distribution of the amount of outputs used in transactions included in this block.
panels.title: Transaction Outputs

panels.description: Difficulty used for mining the last block
panels.title: Difficulty

list.description: quantile to filter for in the panels that use distributions
list.label: quantile
list.name: quantile
